body_html: Hmm I thought it's just a new GCC thing, but if it's this common then we need to come up with a better solution than maintaining a matrix of compiler versions that need this piece of code - e.g. I had to add this function to get the code to compile with Apple clang. I'll have to figure out some template magic 😕
